'''Sharing''' is a joke [[effect]] from [[Java Edition 15w14a]] which replaces the data value of the [[Weakness]] effect.

== Effect ==
Sharing causes mobs to drop random items in a random amount of time. The loot table used is the same as that of a [[Mineshaft#Loot|Mineshaft chest]]. The items are:
*{{ItemLink|Bread}}
*{{ItemLink|Coal}}
*{{ItemLink|Diamond}}[[Diamond|s]]
*{{ItemLink|Gold Ingot}}[[Gold Ingot|s]]
*{{ItemLink|Iron Horse Armor}}
*{{ItemLink|Iron Ingot}}[[Iron Ingot|s]]
*{{ItemLink|Iron Pickaxe}}[[Iron Pickaxe|s]]
*{{ItemLink|Lapis Lazuli}}
*{{ItemLink|Melon Seeds}}
*{{ItemLink|Pumpkin Seeds}}
*{{BlockLink|Rail|Rails}}
*{{ItemLink|Redstone Dust|Redstone}}
*{{ItemLink|Saddle|Saddles}}

The effect can be removed by drinking [[milk]].
